title.rendered: IHCS will be a member of the International Hospitality Awards judging panel

content.rendered:
PARTICIPATING IN THE PANEL OF JUDGES FOR AN INTERNATIONAL AWARD

The Hospitality Awards judging panel is made up of a wide array of hotel industry experts, and IHCS could not be prouder to form part of this select group. As a hotel consulting firm, our mission is to ensure the success of our clients, so participating as one of the judges at this event is the perfect opportunity to promote excellence in the hotel industry.

Prior to founding IHCS in 2015, Juan Pedro Lemes Duarte spent 24 years in the hotel industry, 14 of them in executive positions. Since 2015, this hotel consulting firm has grown while building a strong international presence and reputation based on transparency, commitment and a true interest in the hospitality industry. This is the path that has led us to where we are now, and we accept the great responsibility and honor of having been selected as a judge for such a prestigious international award that IHCS is extremely proud of.

 

ABOUT THE INTERNATIONAL HOSPITALITY AWARDS

The International Hospitality Awards gala will take place in Kiev on March 1, 2020.

Backed by a ten-year history, these awards have a clear mission: to develop the hospitality industry by promoting the achievements of the best projects. The awards are divided into categories that cover a wide array of initiatives, including the Best Luxury Hotel, the Best Honeymoon Destination, the Best Restaurant in a Hotel and the Opening of the Year.

 

AN EVENT THAT SHOWCASES HOTEL EXCELLENCE

As a company specialized in hotel management, we work hard to ensure the best results, gaining in-depth knowledge of the situations that a hotel project may face in its day-to-day operations. We believe that success requires a commitment to quality and excellent service, and we are thrilled to form part of an event that focuses on precisely this: rewarding quality and excellence in order to improve our field overall.

Although the awards ceremony is a few months away, in the meantime we will continue working towards transforming this industry, that we love and respect, into a world centered around guest satisfaction. We will keep you informed with the latest news about the event.

 

5 / 5 ( 1 vote )

excerpt.rendered: It is a great honor to announce that the founder of ihcs, juan pedro lemes, will be one of the judges for the international hospitality awards. This prestigious international event is held yearly to recognize hotels with the best results.
